title: Vax Detox Kit Feline
description: Vaccination detox and support kit for cats
cleaned_text: Vax Detox Kit Feline Information Vax Detox Kit Feline Vax Detox Kit Feline is a homeopathic blend, designed specificaly to support the normal immune system of a cat that has ill effects or vaccinosis from vaccinations. It can be used as a detox kit, for cats that have had bad reactions and vaccinosis to their vaccinations. Or it can also be used as a support detox after a cat has had their vaccinations. Our Vax Detox Kit Feline has been developed to make it easy for you to support your cat with their vaccination regime and restore them back to health. The 3 remedies in the Vax Detox Kit - Vax Support - this assist to remove vaccine toxicity and help to repair damage - DrainHom - to support the body while it is cleansing and detoxing - HP Feline Program - nosodes of the vaccination, to support with ill effects Full instruction sheet will be included with the kit, to help you navigate the detox and support of your pet. Note: This product will not remove any of the benefits from vaccinations. When would you use this kit: - After your kitten or cat has had their vaccinations - For a cat that developed vaccinosis related symptoms after their vaccinations - For a cat that has been diagnosed with an auto immune disease Read our blog about [Vaccinosis in cats and dogs](/blog/vaccinosis-cats-dogs-homeopathy.html). This kit has been developed by a fully qualified Animal Homeopath Handmade in NZ. All remedies have a shelf life of 5 years All remedies come a 25ml bottles How to use Vax Detox Kit Feline comes in a liquid form, as we find this is the easiest way to administer. It is preferred that it is put straight into the mouth of the animal, making sure not to contaminate the dripper. This can be done by adding the drops to a teaspoon, lifting the lip and place in the mouth. But we do realise that this is not always an option, it can therefore be added to food. This is a 3 remedy kit, instructions are on each bottle, also an instruction sheet will be included with each kit. General Disclaimer: Our remedies are designed to support the natural immune system of your pet and animal. We do not claim to treat, medicate or cure any health conditions. If you are worried about your pet or feel they are in pain or suffering please contact your veterinarian. Ingredients FIR, Feline Leukaemia FeLV Preserved in a mild alcohol base.
